shoppingcart.defaultVatRate.title: Default VAT Rate
shoppingcart.defaultVatRate.description: The default VAT rate used for calculating VAT inclusive shipping, discounts and gift certificates in the shopping cart.

productLists.selectMinPriceOptionByDefau.title: Select Minimum Price Option By Default
productLists.selectMinPriceOptionByDefau.description: Select minimum price Option by default for an item including price quantity breaks and bottomless bowl discounts on Product Detail pricing options.

productLists.displayMinPriceAvailable.title: Display Minimum Price Available on Product Lists
productLists.displayMinPriceAvailable.description: Displays the minimum Price available for an item including price quantity breaks and bottomless bowl discounts on Product Lists.

shoppingcart.freeDeliveryOrderLimit.title: Free delivery order minimum
shoppingcart.freeDeliveryOrderLimit.description: Sets the free delivery order minimum.
